war-of-wheels.title: Gladiator Wheels
war-of-wheels.description: Gladiator Wheels is a fast-paced multiplayer game about figthining cars in a medieval-punk environment. Winners of [Bologna Game Farm 2021](https://bolognagamefarm.com): funding and accelerator program in collaboration with [IIDEA](https://iideassociation.com/). Working on a Networking solution for Multiplayer Synchronization. Worked on the in-game Level-Editor Software Architecture for creating custom arenas.
war-of-wheels.long: Gladiator Wheels is a fast-paced multiplayer game about figthining cars in a medieval-punk environment. Winners of [Bologna Game Farm 2021](https://bolognagamefarm.com): funding and accelerator program in collaboration with [IIDEA](https://iideassociation.com/). Working on a Networking solution for Multiplayer Synchronization. Worked on the in-game Level-Editor Software Architecture for creating custom arenas.
war-of-wheels.field: Software Engineering, Game Development, AI Enginnering, Gameplay Programming, UI Programming

smart-bear.title: Smart Bear
smart-bear.description: Smart-Bear is a big data platform to offer evidence-based personalized support for healthy and independent living at home. Working on Data Imputation, Data Augmentation and Data Visualization. Using predictive algorithms like MICE and Random Forest. Studying their performance and effects on distribution and correlation matrices
smart-bear.long: Smart-Bear is a big data platform to offer evidence-based personalized support for healthy and independent living at home. Working on Data Analysis, Data Visualization and predictive analytics with pySpark Apache and Echarts
smart-bear.field: Data Engineering, AI Engineering, Machine Learning Engineering, Data Science, Data Visualization
smart-bear.tech: Python, PySpark (Apache), SparkSQL, MLlib, scikit-learn, Echarts.js (Apache), Docker, git

bologna-game-farm.title: Bologna Game Farm
bologna-game-farm.description: Bologna Game Farm is a funding and accelerator initiative dedicated to innovative startups for the development of videogames. Lead by Ivan Venturi, Luca Marchetti, Gianluca Marani. Promoted by [Regione Emilia Romagna](), [Comune di Bologna](), in collaboration with [IIDEA](https://iideassociation.com/)
bologna-game-farm.long: Bologna Game Farm is a funding and accelerator initiative dedicated to innovative startups for the development of videogames. Lead by Ivan Venturi, Luca Marchetti, Gianluca Marani. Promoted by [Regione Emilia Romagna](), [Comune di Bologna](), in collaboration with [IIDEA](https://iideassociation.com/).

pyEchart.description: An unofficial Echarts options generator with Python.
pyEchart.long: An unofficial Echarts options generator with Python.

pystockbot.title: pyStockBot
pystockbot.description: An automated trading bot with predictive analytics using many trading indicators. Used backtracking algorithms and caching system testing on 5-years-long datas for winning strategies and their performance. Running 24/7 on a RaspberryPi4 sending messages through a custom Telegram Bot
pystockbot.long: An automated trading bot with predictive analytics using many trading indicators.
pystockbot.tech: Python, Yahoo Finance, Binance API, Telegram API, git

Slidify.long: An automated trading bot with predictive analytics using many trading .

swagvote.title: SWAGVote
swagvote.description: A University project about creating a system for online voting: creating, managing and counting electoral votes. Engineering the architecture and reusable software using diagrams like Use Cases, Class Diagram, Sequence Diagram, UML, FSM.
swagvote.long: A University project about creating a system for online voting. Software engineering, Software architecture, data security, data protection.
swagvote.field: Software Engineering, Software Architecture, Data Security, Data Protection
swagvote.tech: Java, SQLite, Maven, Eclipse, JavaFX, git

untitled-nature-game.title: Untitled Nature Game
untitled-nature-game.description: A prototype game about growing-plant based weapons. Many GIFs of the concept went viral on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TommasoRomano_/status/1414574481281101831?s=20&t=IABqJxjBp5sydf0aaCVe8Q) and [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/user/TommasoRomano/?sort=top) collecting more than 5 million's views.
untitled-nature-game.long: A prototype game about growing-plant based weapons. Many GIFs of the concept went viral on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TommasoRomano_/status/1414574481281101831?s=20&t=IABqJxjBp5sydf0aaCVe8Q) and [Reddit](https://www.reddit.com/user/TommasoRomano/?sort=top) collecting more than 5 million's views.

easy-insta-growth.title: Easy Insta Growth
easy-insta-growth.description: An automated solution for Instagram account management and growth. Used on Fiverr to managed more than hundred clients worldwide.
easy-insta-growth.long: An automated solution for Instagram account management and growth. Used on Fiverr to managed more than hundred clients worldwide.
easy-insta-growth.field: Automation Engineering, Social Media, Data Engineering

relow.title: Relow
relow.description: A multiplayer FPS set in procedural worlds that was showcased 2 times at Milan Games Week (2019, 2020) and at Svilupparty Bologna (2019).
relow.long: A multiplayer FPS set in procedural worlds. The main challenge was to synchronize dynamic and procedural arenas to all connected players; advanced AI movements and combats algorithms for these non-static worlds for the online AI bots that fight real-time among real players. Relow was showcased 2 times at Milan Games Week (2019, 2020) and at Svilupparty Bologna (2019).
relow.tech: Unity, C#, Photon Realtime, Google API, Steamworks API

polywar.title: POLYWAR
polywar.description: a low poly online multiplayer FPS which demo on gamejolt  had more than 500k downloads. Partnered with New Reality Games, released Polywar on Steam at the end of 2016
polywar.long: during his second year of high school, he started as hobby the development of an online multiplayer FPS to self-learn game design and development. After a year of work, he gained several thousands of followers among socials and decided to publish a demo on gamejolt which had more than 500k downloads. He caught the attention of many publishers but due to his age (16) and lack of experience, he partnered with New Reality Games which released Polywar on Steam at the end of 2016.
